title: Citibank Thailand Opens Second Branch; Introduces New Country Business Manager
summary: Citibank Thailand has opened its second branch in Thailand. The Silom Smart Banking branch, located at the United Center Building along Silom Road, Bangkok, offers a range of financial services with a unique customer experience, reaffirming Citibank's status as the leading foreign bank in Thailand.
tag-1: Citibank Thailand Opens Second Branch; Introduces New Country Business Manager
tag-2: Citibank Thailand has opened its second branch in Thailand. The Silom Smart Banking branch, located at the United Center Building along Silom Road, Bangkok, offers a range of financial services with a unique customer experience, reaffirming Citibank's status as the leading foreign bank in Thailand.
tag-3: N. Rajashekaran, newly appointed Country Business Manager, Citibank Thailand, said, "Citibank's vision is to provide superior financial services that cater to all customers' needs and to offer a differentiated customer experience through a strong network of branches all over the world. Our target customers in Thailand, ranging from individual clients to organizations, have always been diverse.
tag-4: "We have always stated our desire to further expand Citibank in Thailand and following the approval from the Bank of Thailand, we are pleased to be able to offer customers greater access to our global banking platform," added N. Rajashekaran.
tag-5: The first floor houses a fully functional branch operating under Citibank's pioneering Smart Banking concept, which provides an efficient, high-tech environment for customers. The second floor comprises a Citigold Lounge catering exclusively to Citigold personal banking clients. Citigold is a global wealth-management service that provides domestic and international financial services, and investment advisory for clients whose deposits or investments in the bank are valued at two million baht or more. Additionally, Citibank has introduced its latest residential mortgage and refinance mortgage products at competitive interest rates to Thai consumers.
tag-6: "Opening this new branch is a strategic move to expand Citigroup's operations in Thailand, especially in retail banking," said N. Rajashekaran. "Using our global network branches as a distinguishing feature, supplemented with world-class products, dedicated relationship managers and exceptional service, Citibank strives to provide access and convenience to clients."
tag-7: Services for Citigold customers include a dedicated relationship manager acting as a professional advisor in providing personalized and comprehensive wealth-management solutions using available research and analysis from Citi's global team of specialists. They also include access to the open-architecture wealth-management platform for investment products and the Citigold Online internet service that allows clients to check their account status via the internet from anywhere in the world and make international transfers between Citibank branches with no service charge.
tag-8: In addition, Citigold customers can also enjoy a variety of privileges in more than 160 countries and territories, including free international calls to CitiPhone Banking, cash withdrawals from over one million ATM machines, maximum emergency cash withdrawals of up to $10,000 (with no service charge) and 24-hour emergency medical treatments.
tag-9: Visit www.citibank.co.th for more information or contact CitiPhone Banking at 1588 (24-hour hotline).
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
